content.question: Dramatic increases in global grain production since 1950 have been made possible by

choices.label: substantial increases in the amount of land under cultivation
an increase in the urban workforce
an increase in the agricultural workforce
an increase in the use of energy and technology

content.answer: an increase in the use of energy and technology

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
